tit.e: Kyoto Rekishi Kairo Kyogikai (Kyoro "Historic Corridor" Conference)
Kyoto Rekishi Kairo Kyogikai (Kyoto "Historic Corridor" Conference)

sen.j: 京都歴史回廊協議会（きょうとれきしかいろうきょうぎかい）は、京都の市民活動。
sen.e: Kyoto Rekishi Kairo Kyogikai (Kyoro "Historic Corridor" Conference) is a Kyoto community activity.
Kyoto Rekishi Kairo Kyogikai is a Kyoto civil activity.
sen.cmt: eliminated description in parenthesis since it is written in the title; changed "community" to "civil"
sen.e: Kyoto Rekishi Kairo Kyogikai (Kyoto "Historic Corridor" Conference) is a Kyoto civil activity.

sen.j: 寺社や天皇陵などの歴史遺産が豊富にある京都市北西部地域の住民・大学が中心の団体。
sen.e: The main members of the conference are residents and academics from universities in the north-western part of Kyoto City where there are a large number of historical heritage sites such as temples, shrines, and Emperors' tombs.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: The main members of the conference are residents and academics from universities in the north-western part of Kyoto City where there are a large number of historical heritage sites, such as temples, shrines, and Emperor tombs.

The main members of the conference are residents and academics from universities in the north-western part of Kyoto City where there are a large number of historical heritage sites, such as temples, shrines, and Emperor tombs.

sen.j: 地域の歴史、文化遺産、自然などの学習や保全、人材育成などに取り組む。
sen.e: These members study regional history, cultural heritages, and nature, work on preservation of them, and are engaged in human resource development in these fields.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: These members study and work on the preservation of regional history, cultural heritage, and nature, as well as being engaged in human resource development in these fields.
sen.cmt: fixed grammar to read more naturally
sen.e: These members study and work on the preservation of regional history, cultural heritage, and nature, as well as being engaged in human resource development in these fields.

sen.j: 学校法人立命館 教育文化事業部 歴史回廊推進室
sen.e: Historic Corridor Promotion Office, Department of Education and Culture, Gakko Hojin Ritsumeikan
